scripts.build-dev: rm -rf core/* && cd src/core && npm run build
scripts.unlink: cd ../tsunamyExemple/node_modules && npm unlink tsunamy && cd .. && npm i tsunamy
scripts.publish-patch: npm run build-dev && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm publish && git add . && git commit -m 'update patch' && git push
scripts.publish-minor: npm run build-dev && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish-major: npm run build-dev && npm version major && npm publish
